fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Speed-Up**: Pick a target, All abilities used against them will be delayed for the next night.
- **Scare** (2x): Pick a target, Their action will be delayed by a day and all actions against them are processed as soon as they are sent.
- **Goop** (2x): Secretly cover someone's will and role in slime, making them unreadable when they die, this lasts indefinitely.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Goop** can be reversed by a heal, purge or any similar effects.
- Your **Speed-Up** isn't affected by its own effects, Your **Scare** ability will process instantly, you may queue it at day.
